steps.gmResponse:
Dungeon Entrance
crumbling stone archway. moss-covered walls. flickering torchlight. musty air. ancient runes carved into doorframe.
Exits: north
You see: Old Guard

validationResult.reason: The response provides a coherent description of the Dungeon Entrance and identifies the Old Guard NPC, allowing for potential interaction.

steps.gmResponse: Old Guard says: ""Ah, a fellow traveler! You’ve come at just the right time. I could use a steady hand to help fend off the shadows lurking about. What brings you this way?""

validationResult.reason: [CODE] NPC dialogue generated for 'old guard' (talk is conversation, not a check)

steps.gmResponse: Failed! The Old Guard shakes his head. 'Sorry, friend. Can't help you with that. Orders are orders.'

validationResult.reason: [CODE] Persuasion check failed on 'old guard' (dice roll lost, mechanics work)

steps.gmResponse:
Dark Corridor
narrow stone passage. echoing footsteps. dripping water sounds. spider webs in corners. worn flagstone floor.
Exits: south, east, west, north
You see: Suspicious Loose Stone

Abandoned Throne Room
massive stone throne. faded royal tapestries. cracked marble floor. ominous shadows. cold draft from unseen passages. skeleton slumped on throne.
Exits: south, north
You see: Skeleton King

validationResult.reason: [CODE] Movement succeeded: entered room 'Abandoned Throne Room'

steps.gmResponse: Failed! The Skeleton King laughs, a hollow rattling sound. 'You dare threaten ME? Foolish mortal!' His hostility intensifies.

validationResult.reason: [CODE] Intimidation check failed on 'Skeleton King' (dice roll lost, mechanics work. Flavor text about hostility/consequences is normal for failed intimidation)

steps.gmResponse:
Hidden Chamber
mysteriously lit crystal formations. ancient magical circles etched in floor. floating arcane symbols. humming with magical energy. portal-like shimmer in far wall.
Exits: south
You see: Heavy Stone Door, Ancient Rune Inscription
